title: As a college student or incoming college student, how has the ongoing pandemic affected you? - Quora

response.answer_text: We converted to online class, after mid-march; And as a result, I couldn’t finish the semester. Studying and class time felt more soulless and I fell into a depressed state. Combined with my inverted sleep cycle, since I didn’t need to get up in the morning anymore, I lost concentration and fell many weeks behind on all my online assignments and chapters. I ended up dropping all four courses. I was not prepared for online; you would think it would be easier, but my routine of studying in a comfortable place like Starbucks for hours is how I get my A’s. And all the Starbucks were closed. :(

Well I earned a Bachelor’s degree in biology and finished the semester with a 3.6 gpa. It was hard at first transitioning online because I felt I lost all motivation. But I didn’t let myself stay depressed. Hard work pays off- Juicewrld
